comment.author: 110742199@N08
comment._content: The woman seated is my grandmother Catherine "Katie" McNamee, nee Molloy.  Born in Edenmore, Clonleigh, Lifford on 16/09/1898 and passed away on 02/09/1959 in Porthall, Lifford, Donegal.  I have a copy of this photo at home.

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content:
Thank you so much! This is the first of these (thus far) unidentified portraits that we now have a name for! :-)
Do you by any chance also know the name of the other woman pictured?
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
